source.name: max tokens
source.instructions:
**(True or False):**
The max tokens parameter should always be set to the lowest possible value to save resources.
source.guidance:
False
While setting a lower max tokens value can limit the length of the AI-generated response, setting it too low may result in incomplete or nonsensical outputs. It's important to find a balance that ensures the response length fits within the desired range while still making sense and providing useful information.
